title: Though your customer service is…
text: Though your customer service is helpful, there is no reason that it should take so long to receive my order. I do like your clothing, i have ordered previously with the sane delay. I don't think i will be ordering again

title: Okay so this is my second order with…
text: Okay so this is my second order with this company. The first order I got a medium because it was suggested I size down & they were too tight and rolled down at the waist. But I loved the material and the way they felt soft & dog hair didn’t stick to them. So my second order I got my regular size & still roll down they aren’t tight but still don’t stay up. It was frustrating all day walking delivering mail & my high waisted leggings are constantly rolling down. I will not be purchasing anymore of these leggings they are so expensive as it is to be so uncomfortable around the waist. And I was dumb in buying 3 pair my second order thinking they would be comfortable. 😭

title: Mothball stench
text: The pants that I ordered fit great. However, they have an absolutely terrible mothball stench. I have washed them twice and hung them outside for an entire day and they still stink. I have emailed the company regarding this issue and have not received a response.

title: wouldn't buy clothes again as a plus-size woman
text: Halara has discounts for their "regular" fitting clothing but not their plus-size clothing of the same kind. For example, the adjustable strap waffle overalls. This is discriminatory and honestly just wrong. On top of this, I have worn my overalls maybe four times and the material is already starting to pill. I do not think their plus-size clothing is true to size and the quality is sub-par for the price.

title: I was disappointed with these pants
text: I was disappointed with these pants. The fabric is very thin and feels more like plastic than quality material. I ordered a small size, but they fit awkwardly. Additionally, they don’t look anything like what was shown in the Instagram videos. Overall, not what I expected. I won’t buy the brand anymore.

title: Material has bad smell
text: My last order of jeans fits perfectly but has the most awful smell in the material. I’ve washed several times and cannot get smell out

title: Jean texture
text: I received my order but was disappointed with the texture of the jeans. They aren’t Jean material but more like a legging fabric with colour of jeans. Wasn’t what I was expecting. Disappointing

title: The sizes are not accurate! Return process is painful
text: The sizes are not accurate, the return process has been very difficult. I am still waiting on the email with instructions and it has been over 48 hours.

title: They fit BUT,
text: Yes, they fit and are stretchy but the fabric is so uncomfortable and does not breathe at all. Even with the ease of ordering and styles and sizes available, I unfortunately won't be reordering due to synthetic fabrics. It is a disappointment.

title: After washing the leggings
text: After washing the leggings, it started pilling and the materialwas no longer smooth. For such an expensive legging I would not.expecy that to happen on the first wash. Won't be buying again

title: I love your pants
text: I love your pants, but making returns is very confusing.  I wish you could call and talk to someone.  It seems like it is just a computer responding to my questions and I get nowhere?

title: I was not happy with the delivery…
text: I was not happy with the delivery process. I was told 7 days and it took twice that time and I did not get my package before vacation. I was also not happy with the fit of the jeans style leggings. Not at all what I had hoped, I have been very impressed with previous orders

title: I ordered jeans on 10/4 and received…
text: I ordered jeans on 10/4 and received them on 11/2. I received one communication saying they were delayed - which was helpful. When I ordered them, nothing indicated to me that they were a pre-sale item and would not be shipped out. I recommend making that clear to the customer, so they are not dissatisfied with the length of time to receive this purchase.

title: SMELLY SMELLY SMELLY
text: SMELL! Have worn and washed several times but the chemical smell is awful. Super sad because they are the perfect teacher pants… but SO GROSS THAT SMELL!

title: I love Halara but everything order fits…
text: I love Halara but everything order fits differently than the last item. I order a large in everything. Some are too big, some should be an XS. I don’t know what size to order because the sizing isn’t consistent.

title: Not what I expected
text: Unfortunately the pants I ordered were not what I expected. The material is stretchy with they are not form fitting. I really was looking forward to using them but I will be returning them. The material is thick which was a plus.

title: They don't roll up at the bottom
text: I bought 3 pairs in different colours and although they fit well round the waist they do not fold at the hem as pictured.  The fabric is too thin and wide and they just keep unfolding and falling down. Disappointed as they are too long without being rolled up. Not sure what the solution is. As much as I like them, they just don't look like they do on the website.

title: I have returned pieces over 10 days ago…
text: I have returned pieces over 10 days ago and I haven’t received acknowledgment of return nor refund.

title: All around hassle
text: The return/refund policy is a hassle, and the clothing isn't made with consistent sizing. So, it's always a risk to order from them.  In addition, I had a gift card and chose to wait a few months to use it, and they deactivated it!  I thought that was illegal since gift cards are considered as cash. So i had to wait to place my order because I had to contact this company about getting the gift card reinstated.  THEN, once I was finally able to place my order, the gift card didn't show on the receipt, so I had to contact them again to make sure it was applied.  Once that was sorted, i get another email stating that my order won't be shipped until my item is made. I was never informed that the item wasn't created yet.  If something is pre-order, the customer should know.

title: Within 20 minutes of ordering I…
text: Within 20 minutes of ordering I connected with customer service via chat and requested a size change.  I was told the request had been passed along.  10 hours later I got an email that my order had shipped.  Size had not been changed. When I reached out again I was told I would have to pay for return shipping to exchange them.  They did offer a $10 GC code for future order.  Not good enough in my opinion.  Return shipping should have been waived.

title: While trying on my leggings they ripped…
text: While trying on my leggings they ripped right under my butt cheek area. The material is not as stretchy as I thought and I've never had any issues with other top brands. I need to send back for another pair of refund but I'm not able to since I can't figure out how to find shipping labels. Most likely won't ever buy again.

title: I don’t recommend this product or…
text: I don’t recommend this product or company. It was my first time buying from them and I bought these pants after reading numerous reviews. Only to find out when I received them they’re cheaply made and do not stay up on my hips/waist. I keep having to pull them up because they fall down, which is very obnoxious when you’re working out or doing anything. I would have returned the product if it wasn’t so difficult to make a return with this company. Overall just very disappointed.

title: Love your products but shipping took…
text: Love your products but shipping took almost a month. I email about this issue but nothing was done, no answers or any communication.

title: Not what I expected
text: Some of the items aren't what I expected based on the description and photos shown. I ordered a pair of softlyzero leggings and they are extremely thin, based on the photos I expected something that would be a bit thicker for the winter months. I also am a bit disappointed in the corduroy pants I got, they're rolled up in all of the photos so I expected the pant length to reflect that style, but they aren't long enough for me to roll up. All in all, they are decent products, but I just don't feel like the descriptions and photos shown do a great job of showcasing the products based on what I received.

title: My package is being held by the…
text: My package is being held by the shipping company. They say it is not prepared properly for shipping. I have recently had a few responses from customer service but with no results to remedy the situation. I would like to receive the clothing I ordered and paid forLaura messinger

title: My yoga pants had two separate holes in…
text: My yoga pants had two separate holes in them brand new and the sizing varied between different pieces.

title: They’re comfortable pants but such poor…
text: They’re comfortable pants but such poor quality. I would be willing to pay more for better pants.

title: The design for the jumper is awful as…
text: The design for the jumper is awful as it side zips and is impossible to don without assistance of another person. Would have been much better to have a pull on option without a zipper.

title: Not easy to return
text: Buying clothes online takes some trust and most companies make it easy to return. Halara prefers to offer you a gift card sans the shipping fee. IF you return the items that do not fit, you have to pay the shipping. I I am short 5’3 and 136 lbs. I bought petite size  hoping they would Not be too long, but instead were too tight. The medium sized I returned for fit, but are of course way too long, and still fit a bit tight. It does take a long time to get your items and really wanted some comfortable fitting pants, but it was tough for me here

title: I bought 5 pairs of slacks..
text: I bought 5 pairs of slacks... Didn't live up to the hype. Yes, they are stretchy but they are also a heavy material. Dune look anything like I saw. Very misleading

title: Bad customer service experience
text: I was sent the wrong item and contacted customer service. They said I had to return the item and purchase the right one with the refunded money, as they are not able to send me the correct item. I originally purchased the product with a 20% off coupon so the item I ordered would be more expensive for me when I repurchase it withoutthe coupon. When I explained this to customer service they stopped responding and I haven't been able to come in contact since.

title: Returns are too expensive
text: Returns are too expensive. $30 to send something back! The products are great but can’t risk having to return something.

title: Halara SoCinched High Waisted Tummy…
text: Halara SoCinched High Waisted Tummy Control.I recieved these today, hoping they would keep their promise of not rolling down, but as soon as I sat down in the tights they rolled down. I tried repositioning them but they rolled down no matter what. They are soft and comfortable, but I need a pair that don't roll down...

title: Unimpressed with the quality of the…
text: Unimpressed with the quality of the pants - i thought based on the ads i was seeing, they would be better made.

title: Clothes didn’t arrive
text: I ordered clothes for 2 special events. Those dates have come and gone, and the order is still not here - almost 2 weeks after the arrival date on the check out page. Probably won’t order again.

title: So sad!
text: One pair I got was great. The other pair ripped along the seam within 5 minutes of putting them on. And no I didn't get the wrong size. Super disappointed because the other pair was great. Won't spend that much money again on a hit or miss.

title: clothing arrived with a repulsive…
text: clothing arrived with a repulsive manufacturing smell. Hoping wash #3 after a vinegar soak takes care of it.

title: Again your return process is very…
text: Again your return process is very difficult. This is my second time having problems with a return

title: Cute but poor quality product
text: Slow shipping and disappointing quality. I was excited to finally get my jeans 2 weeks after ordering. Unfortunately, after wearing them for 8 hours in my work from home office job they already have several small snags in them. For the money I would expect a lot better quality.

title: Item did not fit my body properly
text: Item did not fit my body properly. It wasn’t about the size it was about how it was made. I’ve been trying to return it since it has arrived and I have received no information on how to.

title: my returns
text: Took a long time to get a response on the app.  and I wish I could have did both my returns thru the app and would have been nice and easy.  Instead they messed up and now it has been a long drawn out ordeal.

title: The jeans are cute but smell terrible
text: The jeans are cute but smell terrible. I’ve washed them five times and they still smell bad. Also, one of the pockets was sewed with too much material and looks bulky when on.

title: Honestly
text: Honestly, was quite disappointed in how long it took for me to receive the package.

title: Disappointing returns process
text: For relatively high priced items I'm disappointed there isn't a free returns service. Also the requirement to take a photograph on each item returned means I will not be using Halara again. Why should I need to stipulate that an item doesn't fit me well by taking a photograph to prove it? I am not comfortable with this.

title: I’m just not a fan of the products I…
text: I’m just not a fan of the products I have purchased. Materials are thin and leave a lot to be desired.

title: I’m incredibly dissatisfied
text: I’m incredibly dissatisfied with my leggings. The other 3 items are just ok. But those leggings. No way. They’re the whole reason I initially ordered. They seem defective and fall down and are terrible quality. This deterred meFrom ever ordering from halara again. If I could return and get a refund I would

title: Picture misrepresented product
text: I bought trousers. There was no info re: the fact that they are styled as trousers and material is atheleisure in description. Picture misrepresented product. Camel colour is more yellow and pants for big.

title: Wouldn’t use too complicated to return and make sure you send back any freebies
text: The measurements of clothing wasn’t accurate. I had to return all items and it was really confusing as you had to wait for confirmation from the customer service before even getting details of how to return. The online portal says you can’t return any free gifts but when you read the same print it says you have to so don’t get caught out!

title: ugly mediocre quality clothes
text: the stuff is all mediocre. not better quality than items from walmart that are a fraction of the price. I wont take my chance on ordering anything for here again. the sizes are inconsistent and the clothes are ugly to be perfectly frank

title: I wish Halara had more curve options
text: I wish Halara had more curve options. There are so many cute smaller sizes but the curve option is limited! I love Halara and everything I’ve received but curvy girls are very limited! I could order more if we had just as many options as smaller sizes!

title: The product was great but the shipping…
text: The product was great but the shipping was terrible. I opted for the free shipping because the time frame given was acceptable. If I would have known it was actually coming from China and that time frame provided had no way of being accurate logistically I may have went a different route. The lack of honesty in predicting delivery was disheartening.

title: They roll down and pinch
text: The pants roll down and pinch my skin and it pulls the baby hairs. Makes it very uncomfortable and painful to wear. Very disappointed

title: Penalizes plus size customers
text: Inconsistent sizing throughout all of their pants. (Same measurements - sometimes I need XL(16), sometimes 1X (18), sometimes 2X(18).  All with the same size waist!)   Plus size clothing costs significantly more (nearly double with two particular pairs of pants)  No discounts for plus size clothing.  A LOT of the items are not available at all for plus size women.  And apparently there are no short fat people - no plus size petites are available.

title: It was not clear from the photo that…
text: It was not clear from the photo that the jeans had such an exegerated flare, which I did not like and was a disappointment. Otherwise the jeans fitted well and was very comfortable.

title: You make it extremely difficult to…
text: You make it extremely difficult to return order exchange an item. I even downloaded the app!!

title: How do I make a return?
text: The shipping took a long time and the return process for one of the items is clunky.

title: The blue pants did not meet my…
text: The blue pants did not meet my expectation for the  price i paid i did not like the fit and ended up giving it away.

title: Both skirts ordered were the same size…
text: Both skirts ordered were the same size and one skirt was sewn very wonky and made a large bell shape which was very unflattering. I wrote a review and no one reached out to address the issue

title: Fabric has no structure
text: Fabric has no structure. Can see every lump and bump of my thighs and underwear underneath the pants.

title: Not a Good Experience All Around
text: The stretchy work pants look hoghly more professional on the website than they do in person. Upon trying them on, I looked more like I was going to yoga than to work. I think I'd be called for a meeting with HR if I ever wore the pants I ordered to work. Returning was an absolute nightmare. I had to email the support line, didn't get a response, and the only way to process my return was through an extensive conversation via their live chat. Insane experience for a company that is advertised everywhere. I really looked forward to my order and I'm sad.

title: Long shipment
text: Long shipment,  I thought it comes from the US, and only after ordering,  found out it's of Chinese origin.Product not as it looks it photos.

title: To be honest
text: To be honest, After reading review after review I was so excited to finally find a comfy pair of jeans that not only fit good but made me feel great. I am a larger woman and that's a hard feat. It took much longer than expected to recieve my package but it didn't matter because when they finally did arrive I was so excited. When I tried them on I was so disappointed. They were huge not only in the waste but the legs as well. I understand I ordered wide leg however these were atleast double wide leg. Unfortunately I'll be returning these jeans. I really really wanted to love them.

title: This was my first purchase
text: This was my first purchase.  The items did not fit properly.  I went online to return but had to call email the company because they asked for pictures of items.  When I emailed them, I was disappointed to find that I had to pay to return the items.   I could have gotten a gift card, but after my experience,  I chose not to.

title: Inconsistent sizing
text: Inconsistent sizing. I purchased jeans in  size Small but when I purchased a different pair of jeans in a size Small they were way to small.

title: Unreliable sizing
text: Unreliable sizingI ordered 3 items and only one was true to size, and true to the picture on the website. Two items were far too big. Because returns are too much of a hassle and expensive (international shipping and tracking), I will simply donate my new orders to charity. I don't recommend Halara.

title: I followed the size chart
text: I followed the size chart, ordered the suggested size, they were way too big.   I ordered them on Sept 30, and had no idea that I had to wait till the sale was over before they would ship my purchase.    They didn't ship it out till Oct 14 and I did not recieve my purchase till Oct 22.  Almost a month after I ordered the pants.   I have followed the return instructions, I'm hoping the returns are not as complicated as the order.     I was dissapointed and may give them another chance someday, but I will probably order from Amazon from now on, way easier for returns and faster shipping and usually correct size chart.

title: Arrived with a hole in them
text: They are lovely leggings but came with a huge hole in them, such a shame because they look nice on. And for some reason I can’t return or exchange them.

title: The returns are unnecessarily complicated
text: They make the returns unnecessarily complicated. While the products seem nice, they are not fitted for truly petite sizes. Since the only option was to order online, I could not try the clothes on in advance and eventually, I had to opt for a return. However, while they make it seem like a return is an easy option (after all they are required by law to provide this option) they make you fill out the whole form only to find out that you cannot submit it. Everything else on their website works, the internet connection works, and different browsers have been tried, but the button to "submit" the return request simply does not work. So you need to go through a lengthy process of returning the items via a help centre, where they still try to push you to keep the order. While I appreciate the effort to avoid sending an unnecessary amount of packages back and forth I do not appreciate the amount of time it took me to complete one simple return, especially since I had the impression that there was not a "technical issue" but rather it was a well thought through approach to make customers keep the orders even if they want to return them

title: Sizing was way off and took a long time…
text: Sizing was way off and took a long time to receive my order

title: Will not purchase here again. Received my purchased unfortunately…
text: Received my purchase and unfortunately these leggings did not meet my expectations. Have been trying to reach customer service to return them however no one gets back to you with return instructions. And the website does not instruct you either. Will not make another purchase here.

title: Jump suit is awesome fit but the square…
text: Jump suit is awesome fit but the square neck is less sharp than I would preferJeans are way more flared/ wide leg than I like and the colour is off, I thought I ordered the dark blue denim these are more or a lighter blue

title: I was told if I gave my phone number…
text: I was told if I gave my phone number for texts I would get a discount. I DIDN’T get any discount.

title: Returned …
text: Returned my very first order for a gift card. Received my second order and I'm still not pleased with the items.

title: Great for athleisure. Don't recommend for anything else.
text: Halara is decent at athleisure. I wouldn't recommend their clothing for work, even if they say it's for work. I thought the material would be a little thicker. Ordered about 10 items. 7-8 are getting sent back because they just don't fit right.

title: Inconsistent sizing and fit
text: I bought 3 pairs of pants and followed the size guide. All size medium, all different sizes. I’ll be returning at least 2 of the pants if not all 3. I haven’t decided if I want to risk washing one of them to see if they’ll shrink a bit to fit better. I’ll be keeping 2 of the tops but one will be returned. I didn’t like the fabric.

title: Poorly made, thin fabric, impractical pockets and sizing
text: The pants were a much thinner legging material than I thought they would be. I’m 5’10” and 140lbs and I ordered a size small/tall. They are too short and too loose for me. The regular pockets are too loose to hold my phone and the side pockets are too small to be functional. On my second time wearing them the button above the zipper popped off. Poorly made, cheap fabric, and not very functional. That being said they are extremely comfy!

title: I got waisted nave blue ones from tik…
text: I got waisted nave blue ones from tik tok shop and i am obsessed how nice they are,these booty lifting not so much very hard material, not happy at all,sorry i wish i order the same one from tik tok shop

title: The pants were too short and it took…
text: The pants were too short and it took too long to receive the items. I didn’t realize there was no refunds or exchanges.

title: Horrible return policy!  Work pants are yoga pants with pockets slapped on
text: I got the pants that are supposed to be good enough to wear to work.   The pants are just yoga pants with pockets sewn on.  I had planned to return them, but it required 3 photos to be sent.  I feel that is a horrible return policy.  I don't like the product.  They are skin tight and I am not comfortable wearing them to the office.  And asking me for a photo as proof??  Never trying anything from here again.

title: Late arrival
text: Took 2 weeks to arrive from ordering. Too long!

title: Refund
text: Still awaiting a refund.   Followed all the instructions, downloaded the App, sent photos and paid personally for postage and still a month later there’s no sign of a refund?!

title: Not great
text: Overall not great. Shipping takes ages, sizing guides are misleading. Tried to return but I have to pay extra costs to do so. Overall very disappointing and dissatisfied, would not purchase again.

title: I was not satisfied with the pants I…
text: I was not satisfied with the pants I ordered. The material didn’t feel breathable. The waistband was very tight for the pant size.

title: wrong size sent
text: A bit frustrated as i was sent the incorrect size for a shirt i ordered (i ordered a medium and was sent an extra small).  I still have the shirt as the shipping to sent it back would be as much as the cost of the shirt, very simply - not worth it.

title: Fabric not as expected
text: The fabric is just too much like athletic wear. It is like “quick dry“ fabric, the type of fabric I wear for camping or hiking, but not to the office. So for some of the pant styles, it’s fine, but not all of them. It would look ridiculous with a pair of heels—hiking boots, yes, but heels, no. Also, it’s not really suitable for cold winter climates. And that’s what I was looking for.

title: Didn’t get the size I ordered…
text: I ordered my last pants to be a petite and received a regular. They are way too long and I can’t wear them at all. Live the material but sucks that they don’t fit because I didn’t get what I ordered

title: Quality was not as expected

title: Terrible Return policy

title: Way too tight on me & they want a pic to return?

I hesitated submitting an immediate review because I was hopeful that washing the pants would solve the problem but it's been about 2 months & they have been washed more than 6 times & the smell is still there. I want to love them but I'm honestly embarrassed to wear them in public because it still smells so strong. Perfume doesn't even improve the smell. I don't understand why it stinks so bad. Is it just the denim? The other pair of athletic leggings I purchased in the same order does not have that smell.

title: Crappy quality, crappier service
text: I ordered several items. One arrived not fully sewn together. The sizing between the items was also very inconsistent and stitching quality not great. They were NOT transparent about their return policy - anything you get a discount with is apparently not returnable or exchangeable. I reached out regarding my not sewn together pants and no answer, radio silence. Waste of $200 - will never do it again

title: Return process is grueling.
text: I ordered two items.  One of which I loved!  The other didn't fit in length and looked cheap to me.  I have been trying to make a return, but they have me jumping through hoops, asking for photos of the product, etc.  All we should have to do is print a return label and send it back for a refund.

title: trouble with returns
text: this has happened more than once-- I tried to initiate a return and the order seems to have disappeared from my history.  I have no emails confirming my return and no instructions. I know in the past, Halara refunded my account and had me donate the items I didn't want, but I don't know why this is so hard to see online and I don't know what's happening with this one now.  Please make your returns system more transparent.

title: Slow shipping

I measured myself and ordered the size based on my measurements in the sizing chart. Now I’m torn what to do. I want to order the next larger size because they are so comfortable, but I don’t want to wait another two weeks or more waiting for the package. I also ordered them when they had a deal going on and won’t get the same price.

title: Disappointed

I was disappointment when I opened them to find they weren't a study, durable material, but felt more like chiffon. I was even more disappointment when I put them on. They weren't flattering on me. I think they're meant for skinny girls.

title: The clothes were the wrong size even…
text: The clothes were the wrong size even though I used the Size Chart as a guide.  the return process was unnecessarily complicated, when the end result was either pay the return postage yourself or take a gift card.  I chose a gift card and it came quickly.   However, I will not order from Halara again after using the gift card.

title: Soft & Comfy, but Terrible Return Process
text: I tried 3 different pairs of pants. They were all so soft and would have been comfortable if they were the right size. I just wanted to exchange for a size up - but that is not offered in the Tall size. So then I decided just to return the pants. The return process is ridiculous. You need to upload photos and then wait for "approval". Nearly a week later and I'm still waiting for the information to send the pants back - and I need to pay the shipping. The other option was to keep the pants and get a Halara gift card. Not helpful - then I have a pile of pants that don't fit, can't order the size I need, and don't want to try anything else because the return process is so annoying. If you are confident in your fit, or don't have hips like I do, I'm sure these are wonderful, comfy pants - but not worth the hassle if you think you may need to return/exchange.

title: The product is ALWAYS amazing...
text: The product is ALWAYS amazing.... ALWAYS. The customer service was sub par this time. I had placed an order and the billing updated the shipping to the incorrect address.. I IMMEDIATELY reached out to customer service who assured me that the address was updated and correct.. Got an email 3 days later stating the address was unable to update due to the product already being shipped. It was super inconvenient having to go to my accountants office to get my product - especially after being assured that the address was updated less than 5 minutes after the order was placed.

If customers wish to return their clothes, they have to pay for the return cost themselves, which can be expensive since the pacakge is shipped overseas. In addition to the inconsistent clothing sizes, there's a lot to be desired with Halara.

title: Clothes come from China
text: Clothes come from China. It was not clear on the website that this is a Chinese company, and the clothes are shipped from China. I thought that I would be able to return something that didn't fit. I ordered four things, and I would like to return two of them, but they were sale items, so no returns. They were fairly expensive, even on sale. To return items, you have to pay for return shipping. There's nothing that tells you how much that might be. My guess is ALOT! I would have thought twice before ordering if I had known that the items were coming from China.

title: Low quality
text: I would say Halara is legit, but you need to understand how much are you willing to pay for low quality fabric. I got my order, "High Waisted Button Zipper Multiple Pockets Solid Skinny Cargo Pants" size S, on time, with no issues. I paid over £45, delivery included. Opened the package, fabric soft and stretchy. I tried them on, very comfortable, light, easy to squat, I thought theses are so far the best quality trousers that I have ordered through online. Day 1 - Worked in retail for 8 hours with these trousers. I was wearing long t-shirt with these trousers. Got home, changed my t-shirt and when I looked down I had a hole under the front zip. I was angry, because I spent that money and on day one already a hole. Okay, I thought I can fix and when I started sewing I noticed that part was very poor stitch from manufacture company or whoever were sawing these trousers together. All fixed now, so I was fine with it. Day 2 - Another 8 hour shift. Trousers still feel amazing, light and perfect material, all the dirt and dust that I usually get in retail comes off easily. Went to toilet and front main button pops off. And I was like ... what else now? Luckily I had long t-shirt that was hiding everything. Got home and fixed the button.On next day button popped off, because of my poor stitch. Im still wearing these trousers, but they are not worth that high price. Thats why I give two stars instead of one, because company is good, just the price is way too high for that specific product.
